snippet: Arid Uka, a native of Kosovo, testified that he shot the men at the Frankfurt airport to prevent them from deploying to Afghanistan.
abstract: German court convicts Kosovo native Arid Uka of murder and sentences him to life in prison for the killing of two United States airmen at the Frankfurt, Germany, airport in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Arid Uka, a native of Kosovo, testified that he shot the men at the Frankfurt airport to prevent them from deploying to Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Man Gets Life Term for Killing 2 U.S. Airmen in Germany
headline.main: Man Gets Life Term for Killing 2 U.S. Airmen in Germany
headline.print_headline: Germany: Life Sentence for G.I. Deaths
